formattedAddress: 1850 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10031, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1850 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10031-1714, USA

originalText.text:
We had a wonderful experience working with QBDP Architecture on a home renovation project. Kyu helped us re-imagine how to use our space. He and his team carefully listened to our needs (both functionally and aesthetically) and came up with an elegant solution (integrated laddar, murphy bed and bookshelf system) to improve our limited storage situation.

He was also effortless to work with throughout the project: finding the project team, managing materials, and delivering high quality work on time. He was transparent and communicative the whole time. When issues arose, he worked with the contractors or suppliers proactively, so we didn't have to worry about anything.

Overall, we had a fantastic experience!

originalText.text: We had a seamless experience working with Kyu and QBDP Architecture over the course of the end of 2022 and beginning of 2023.  Not only did Kyu help us put together a great plan for combining our two condo units into one, he also had contacts throughout the permitting and construction processes to shepherd us as painlessly as possible.  We love our new home and are very grateful for all the help that we received from QBDP!

text.text: We had a seamless experience working with Kyu and QBDP Architecture over the course of the end of 2022 and beginning of 2023. We love our new home and are very grateful for all the help that we received from QBDP!

originalText.text: Kyu is a consummate professional with creativity, patience, and a keen aesthetic sensibility. His work on my housing renovation turned out as well as I could have hoped for - despite challenges and obstacles during COVID (through no fault of the architect). He was able to bring my vision, even if it was at time not clearly defined, to life and helped shape it so that it would work with the conditions of the space. In addition to being a great architect and client manager for the contractor and other parties, Kyu was also attuned to cost management and budget, which he took into account in every step of the process. I felt that he took an ownership mentality in the project, which is rare, from my experience, from third party service providers. I highly recommend this firm to anyone seeking a compelling home renovation or build.

originalText.text:
We called upon Kyu of QBDP Architecture to work with us on an apartment combination in a Prewar UWS building- no small task to blend 1923 with 2023 aesthetics and functionality.
Collaborating with Kyu was pure joy – every aspect of the project was carefully discussed, considered, and drawn with appreciation for our vision, incorporating his valued and appreciated aesthetic, acute attention to the smallest details and clear knowledge of NYC building requirements.
The ease and timeliness of all communications, his patience with seemingly endless challenges, and his respect for requisite timelines, are what we appreciated the most.  Having Kyu on our team was invaluable!

originalText.text: Kyu beautifully renovated my new apartment in West village. It was literally my dream home came to a reality for my every day life. I love the simple and modern style, which matches well with his taste. Now, I’m super happy to live in an apartment that looks like in a magazine!
